sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REMT3000 ( DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , REIP_DT , DDLNE_YN , DDLNE_DT , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_SUMT_DT , DEGTR_NM , CORP_NM_FMNM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , CORP_NUM , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_ZPCD , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_FNDTN_ADDR , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_DTL_PATR_ADDR , JURI_TX_OFFC_CD , PENTR_CD , TX_DEPTY_NUM , HMTX_ID , TX_PGM_CD , PERN_CHRG_DEPT_NM , PERN_CHRG_NM , PERN_CHRG_PHN_NUM , CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , #calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , #systemkey# , #reipDt# , #ddlneYn# , #ddlneDt# , #calcSevePayPsnSumtDt# , #degtrNm# , #corpNmFmnm# , #busoprRgstnNum# , #resnRegnNum# , #corpNum# , #incmRegrstDebrZpcd# , #incmRegrstDebrFndtnAddr# , #incmRegrstDebrDtlPatrAddr# , #juriTxOffcCd# , #pentrCd# , #txDeptyNum# , #hmtxId# , #txPgmCd# , #pernChrgDeptNm# , #pernChrgNm# , #pernChrgPhnNum# , #cllnDebrDivCd# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REMT3000 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , REIP_DT=#reipDt# , DDLNE_YN=#ddlneYn# , DDLNE_DT=#ddlneDt# , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_SUMT_DT=#calcSevePayPsnSumtDt# , DEGTR_NM=#degtrNm# , CORP_NM_FMNM=#corpNmFmnm# , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM=#busoprRgstnNum# , RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# , CORP_NUM=#corpNum# , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_ZPCD=#incmRegrstDebrZpcd# , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_FNDTN_ADDR=#incmRegrstDebrFndtnAddr# , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_DTL_PATR_ADDR=#incmRegrstDebrDtlPatrAddr# , JURI_TX_OFFC_CD=#juriTxOffcCd# , PENTR_CD=#pentrCd# , TX_DEPTY_NUM=#txDeptyNum# , HMTX_ID=#hmtxId# , TX_PGM_CD=#txPgmCd# , PERN_CHRG_DEPT_NM=#pernChrgDeptNm# , PERN_CHRG_NM=#pernChrgNm# , PERN_CHRG_PHN_NUM=#pernChrgPhnNum# , CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD=#cllnDebrDivCd# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE REMT3000 SET REIP_DT=#reipDt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE REMT3000 SET DDLNE_YN=#ddlneYn# , DDLNE_DT=#ddlneDt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE REMT3000 SET DDLNE_YN=#ddlneYn# , DDLNE_DT=#ddlneDt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REMT3000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , REIP_DT , DDLNE_YN , DDLNE_DT , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_SUMT_DT , DEGTR_NM , CORP_NM_FMNM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , CORP_NUM , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_ZPCD , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_FNDTN_ADDR , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_DTL_PATR_ADDR , JURI_TX_OFFC_CD , PENTR_CD , TX_DEPTY_NUM , HMTX_ID , TX_PGM_CD , PERN_CHRG_DEPT_NM , PERN_CHRG_NM , PERN_CHRG_PHN_NUM , CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM REMT3000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , REIP_DT , DDLNE_YN , DDLNE_DT , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_SUMT_DT , DEGTR_NM , CORP_NM_FMNM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , CORP_NUM , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_ZPCD , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_FNDTN_ADDR , INCM_REGRST_DEBR_DTL_PATR_ADDR , JURI_TX_OFFC_CD , PENTR_CD , TX_DEPTY_NUM , HMTX_ID , TX_PGM_CD , PERN_CHRG_DEPT_NM , PERN_CHRG_NM , PERN_CHRG_PHN_NUM , CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM REMT3000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
CLUT_YR_MNTH LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , CLUT_YR_MNTH DESC , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM REMT3000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
CLUT_YR_MNTH LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD) AS CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_NM , AA.CLUT_YR_MNTH , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM ,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD, BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM ,NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD ,BB.BUSIN_CD ,fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.BUSIN_CD,1,4),BB.DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM ,BB.HAN_NM ,BB.RESN_REGN_NUM ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ,fcBass0400CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'2') AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM REMT3000 AA, PSNL0100 BB,PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.CLUT_YR_MNTH LIKE #clutYrMnth# || '%'
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
ORDER BY AA.CLUT_YR_MNTH DESC , CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD DESC ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD) ASC , BB.RESN_REGN_NUM ASC , AA.SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD) AS CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_NM , AA.CLUT_YR_MNTH , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM ,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD, BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM ,NVL(BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD,'A0060000') AS PYSP_GRDE_CD ,BB.BUSIN_CD ,fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.BUSIN_CD,1,4),BB.DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM ,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM ,BB.HAN_NM ,BB.RESN_REGN_NUM ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM ,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ,fcBass0400CDNM(CC.DPOB_CD,CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'2') AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM REMT3000 AA, PSNL0100 BB,PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.CLUT_YR_MNTH LIKE #clutYrMnth# || '%'
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
A.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
)
